Revamp¶

class revamp.DataPreperation[source]¶
Transform(X, cleansing_step)[source]¶

Instantiate data preparation.

Method Transform will accept data frame (X) and cleansing_step(missing_values, encoding, one_hot_encoding, scaling, and all) as arguments.

Parameters

  • X – DataFrame.

  • cleansing_step – Operations(missing_value_imputation, encoding, one_hot_encoding, scaling, all).
